data.name: BagOfMushrooms
data.value: Every 30 to 300 seconds activate the camera effect (or speed up effect, if the yellow mushroom got disabled) from the yellow shroom.

data.name: BestMenderInTheWorld
data.value: Destroying signs and some background objects take 50 geo from you. If you have no geo, you take 1 damage instead.

data.name: BlessingOfTheButterfly
data.value: Monarch wings take 3 seconds to recharge, regardless if refreshed earlier. Doesn't refresh wings after these three seconds!

data.name: Camouflage
data.value: The knight is invisible.

data.name: CaringShell
data.value: Hazard respawns zone don't work. You always spawn at the start of the room.

data.name: ConcussiveStrike
data.value: Getting hit cause concussion on you, inverting left/right inputs during it's duration. Last 3 seconds. Taking a hit while already being concussed, extends the duration by 2 seconds.

data.name: DeliciousMeal
data.value: Poggy is chasing you, eating/killing you after 2 minutes past. You can feed him rancid eggs from the inventory to reset the timer to 2 mins.

data.name: DiamondCore
data.value: You can no longer cancel crystal dash unless being hit by an enemy or charging into a wall.

data.name: DiamondDash
data.value: Crystal Dash takes 0.6 seconds longer to charge up.

data.name: DiminishingCurse
data.value: Charms cost 1 notch more.

data.name: DramaticEntrance
data.value: Entering a boss fight, sets your health to 1 and clears you soul.

data.name: DreamBlessing
data.value: Dream Nail only gives you 10 soul (+ 5 for every dreamer) doubled with dream wielder. Also dream nail is cast 50% slower.

data.name: ElderbugHitList
data.value: When entering a new room with enemies the list marks enemies. If you succeed the \"talk\" with them, you are granted a reward. Be careful, elderbug demands a clean execution.

data.name: EternalSentinel
data.value: Dung clouds no longer deal damage and stays 10 seconds instead of 1. Wearing defender's crest does decrease the duration to 5 seconds instead.

data.name: EternalValor
data.value: Hitting an enemy does generate a stack up to 24. After not hitting an enemy for 3 seconds a stack will go away each 1 second. If enemies you damaged, are still alive once all stacks ran out, you take 2 damage.

data.name: EyeOfTheWatcher
data.value: All rooms are 1 stage darker.

data.name: FlowerRing
data.value: You can only use nail arts with a delicant flower.

data.name: FollowTheLight
data.value: Casting dream nail costs 2 essence (1 with awoken dream nail).

data.name: FriendOfTheJellyfish
data.value: Jellyfishs spawn all over Hallownest.

data.name: GiftOfUnn
data.value: Focusing takes 66 soul. While you have Shape of Unn equipped, this effect is negated.

data.name: GloryOfTheWealth
data.value: Enemies that drop geo normally, only drop 1.

data.name: GraspOfLife
data.value: Walking on the ground for 2 seconds, spawn a fool eater under you.

data.name: GrassBombardement
data.value: Every 7 to 14 jump spawns a grass bomb behind you.

data.name: GreaterMind
data.value: After you die, you lose the last obtained lore power.

data.name: HappyFate
data.value: Decrease your walk- and walkspeed by 0.2, nail damage by 1 and increase your dash cooldown by 0.2 every time you get hit (up to 10 total). Resets once you sit on a bench.

data.name: HotStreak
data.value: Your nail does deal 1 damage. Increasing by 1 each time you hit an enemy (up to 3 per nail upgrade). Resetting if you don't hit an enemy with the nail.

data.name: Imposter
data.value: Focus has a 20% to not restore health. Reduces to 10% if you wear spore shroom.

data.name: Infested
data.value: Spawns a red spider wave every 7 seconds. The last wave spawns a big unkillable one. Resets upon changing the room.

data.name: JellyBelly
data.value: The time you need to be in the air for hard fall is decreased to 0.5 seconds.

data.name: JellyfishFlow
data.value: You cannot move in water.

data.name: JonisProtection
data.value: You cannot obtain lifeblood. Besides charms... probably?

data.name: LaughableThreat
data.value: Some enemies are alerted immediatly after entering the room.

data.name: LifebloodOmen
data.value: Spawns a grimmkin every 3 minutes, blocking all exits until it is killed.

data.name: MantisStyle
data.value: Decrease your nail size by 0.6.

data.name: MarissasAudience
data.value: Occassionaly spawns revek chasing you for 20 to 90 seconds.

data.name: MaskOvercharge
data.value: When you are not on the blinking mask, you loose soul rapidly.

data.name: MindblastOfUnn
data.value: Enemies cannot be hit until you dream nail them. If you don't have dream nail all enemies have triple their health.

data.name: OneOfUs
data.value: Spawns a spore cloud every 12 second. Staying in the cloud for 2 seconds lets you take 1 damage.

data.name: OverwhelmingPower
data.value: Casting spells while you don't have full soul (doesn't affect extra soul vessel) only deal 1 damage.

data.name: PaleLuck
data.value: Enemies have a 5% of being healed instead if you hit them with your nail.

data.name: PureSpirit
data.value: Spells always take your entire soul.

data.name: QueenThorns
data.value: Thorns of Agony are always active, but without the hitbox to damage enemy.

data.name: RelentlessSwarm
data.value: Vengeful Spirit/Shadesoul is replaced by 1 fluke. Wearing fluke nest increases the amount of flukes by 3.

data.name: ReluctantPilgrim
data.value: You can only attack in the air if you have 1 or full health.

data.name: Requiem
data.value: After dying, you always spawn in Dirtmouth

data.name: ReturnToUnn
data.value: You're slowly drawn to the left.

data.name: SacredShell
data.value: You take double damage from all sources of damage.

data.name: ScrewTheRules
data.value: You deal less damage based on your health amount. Also fury of the fallen doesn't work.

data.name: ShadowForged
data.value: Shade cloak cooldown is increased by 0.4 seconds.

data.name: ShiningBound
data.value: Charms do not work.

data.name: SoulExtractEfficiency
data.value: You gain 5 less soul from hits on enemy. Also looses 1 soul every second.

data.name: StagAdoption
data.value: The destination of a stag travel is randomly chosen. Only chooses opened stag stations + Stag Nest (with a 5% chance).

data.name: TouchGrass
data.value: Standing near grass takes a mask every 1.5 seconds.

data.name: Tourist
data.value: Entering the black egg costs 3000.

data.name: TreasureHunter
data.value: Lemm only pays half for relics.

data.name: TrueForm
data.value: Spawns a shade every 2 minutes, taking all your geo and fleeing to the exit where you entered from. The shade can fly through walls. After reaching the exit it stays 5 seconds there. After the time expires it vanishes with all geo that it had hold on.

data.name: UnitedWeStand
data.value: For every companion you have, grimmchild shoot slower, weavers are smaller and hatchlings deal less damage.

data.name: WeDontTalkAboutShade
data.value: Every enemy spawns a sibling upon death. Even with void heart, it stays aggressive.

data.name: WellFocused
data.value: Focus is cast 30% slower.

data.name: WisdomOfTheSage
data.value: Spells cost 2 soul more for every Mr. Mushroom stage that you haven't visited yet.

data.name: YouLikeJazz
data.value: Hatchlings spawn regardless if you have Glowing Womb equipped. Hatchlings take 15 souls instead of 8.
